title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Skills: Teacher Motivation Predictive Factor Analysis and Collaborative Learning Application Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Both in-service and pre-service teachers can analyze how socio-emotional competencies and collaborative learning environments influence motivation
Design motivation prediction models reflecting actual educational contexts (e.g., social support, structured pedagogical methods)
Plan and evaluate collaborative learning activities suitable for large learner groups using digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
